scripts.clean:reports: rm -R -f cypress/reports && mkdir cypress/reports && mkdir cypress/reports/mochareports
scripts.pretest: npm run clean:reports && npx eslint cypress
scripts.report: npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report && npm run report:allure
scripts.test-local: npm run test || npm run report
scripts.cy:basic:ui:demo:test: DEBUG=allure-plugin* cypress run --headless --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/run-basic-demo-ui-test/* || npm run report
scripts.cy:cucumber:ui:demo:test: DEBUG=allure-plugin* cypress run --headless --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/run-cucumber-demo-ui-test/**/*.feature || npm run report
scripts.cy:pom:ui:demo:test: DEBUG=allure-plugin* cypress run --headless --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/run-demo-ui-test-with-page-object-model/* || npm run report
